actor-start.eventDescription: Initial fee for starting the MCP Server Actor

get_article.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving a full Wikipedia article.

get_summary.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving a summary of a Wikipedia article.

get_sections.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving sections of a Wikipedia article.

get_links.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving links from a Wikipedia article.

get_related_topics.eventDescription: Fee for retrieving related topics from a Wikipedia article.

summarize_article_for_query.eventDescription: Fee for summarizing a Wikipedia article for a specific query.

summarize_article_section.eventDescription: Fee for summarizing a section of a Wikipedia article.

extract_key_facts.eventDescription: Fee for extracting key facts from a Wikipedia article.
